verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Command <S%H6680><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H7133>them<s%>, My oblation, my food for my <S%H7133>offerings<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H8104>me<s%>, shall ye observe to <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto me in their due <S%H4150>season<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H801>them<s%>, This is the offering made by fire which ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H3532>he-lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> day by <S%H3117>day<s%>, for a <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>.
The <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>offer<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>offer<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>;

and the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> part of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3795>beaten<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

It is a <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, which was <S%H6213>ordained<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%>, an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And the <S%H5262>drink-offering<s%> thereof shall be the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> for the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%>: in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place shalt thou <S%H5258>pour<s%> out a <S%H5262>drink-offering<s%> of strong <S%H7941>drink<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>offer<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>: as the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and as the <S%H4503>drink-offering<s%> <S%H6213>thereof<s%>, thou shalt offer <S%H801>it<s%>, an offering made by fire, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>he-lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> parts of an ephah of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and the <S%H5262>drink-offering<s%> thereof:
this is the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> of every <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>, besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, and the <S%H5930>drink-offering<s%> thereof.

And in the <S%H7218>beginnings<s%> of your <S%H2320>months<s%> ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>he-lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>;

and <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth parts of an <S%H6241>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%>; and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> parts of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, for the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>;

and a tenth <S%H6241>part<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> unto <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%>; for a <S%H4503>burnt-offering<s%> of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%>, an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And their <S%H5262>drink-offerings<s%> shall be <S%H2677>half<s%> a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%> for a <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and the <S%H7992>third<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> for the <S%H352>ram<s%>, and the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> for a <S%H3532>lamb<s%>: this is the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> of every <S%H2320>month<s%> throughout the <S%H2320>months<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%>.

And <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>he<s%> - <S%H5795>goat<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; it shall be <S%H6213>offered<s%> besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, and the <S%H5930>drink-offering<s%> thereof.
And in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, is <S%H6453>Jehovah<s%>'s passover.

And on the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of this <S%H2320>month<s%> shall be a <S%H2282>feast<s%>: <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> be <S%H398>eaten<s%>.
In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%>: ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%>;

but ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>, and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>he-lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H8549>old<s%>; they shall be unto you without blemish;

and their <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>: <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> shall ye <S%H6213>offer<s%> for a <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> for the <S%H352>ram<s%>;
a tenth <S%H6241>part<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>offer<s%> for <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%>;
and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>he-goat<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, to make atonement for <S%H3722>you<s%>.
Ye shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> these besides the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, which is for a <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>.

After this manner ye shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%>, for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, the <S%H3899>food<s%> of the offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: it shall be <S%H6213>offered<s%> besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, and the <S%H5930>drink-offering<s%> thereof.
And on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> ye shall have a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%>: ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%>.

Also in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H1061>first-fruits<s%>, when ye <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in your feast of <S%H7620>weeks<s%>, ye shall have a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%>; ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%>;

but ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>he-lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> year <S%H8141>old<s%>;

and their <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> for the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>,
a tenth <S%H6241>part<s%> for <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%>;
one <S%H259><s%> <S%H5795>he-goat<s%>, to make atonement for <S%H3722>you<s%>.

Besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, and the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> <S%H6213>thereof<s%>, ye shall offer <S%H8549>them<s%> (they shall be unto you without blemish), and their <S%H5262>drink-offerings<s%>.
